includedAssets.title: Day 1: 12:00 A.M. - 1:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Pioneering real-time drama starring Kiefer Sutherland. CIA agent Jack Bauer is called in to investigate a plot to assassinate a US senator.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Pioneering real-time drama starring Kiefer Sutherland. CIA agent Jack Bauer is called in to investigate a plot to assassinate a US senator.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Pioneering real-time drama starring Kiefer Sutherland. CIA agent Jack Bauer is called in to investigate a plot to assassinate a US senator.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 1:00 A.M. - 2:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack obtains an electronic card carrying information about Palmer, while Janet's father and Teri continue their search for the missing girls.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack obtains an electronic card carrying information about Palmer, while Janet's father and Teri continue their search for the missing girls.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack obtains an electronic card carrying information about Palmer, while Janet's father and Teri continue their search for the missing girls.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 2:00 A.M. - 3:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Suspicions are aroused when Jack verifies the key card was encrypted on Nina's computer. Kim and Janet, meanwhile, flee their captors.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Suspicions are aroused when Jack verifies the key card was encrypted on Nina's computer. Kim and Janet, meanwhile, flee their captors.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Suspicions are aroused when Jack verifies the key card was encrypted on Nina's computer. Kim and Janet, meanwhile, flee their captors.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 3:00 A.M. - 4:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Mason locks down CTU, Jack decides to check out an address from the encrypted key card. David delivers Kim to Gaines, too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Mason locks down CTU, Jack decides to check out an address from the encrypted key card. David delivers Kim to Gaines, too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Mason locks down CTU, Jack decides to check out an address from the encrypted key card. David delivers Kim to Gaines, too.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 4:00 A.M. - 5:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack breaks Penticoff out of prison, hoping to find out what happened to Kim, and Palmer learns why his son is being accused of murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack breaks Penticoff out of prison, hoping to find out what happened to Kim, and Palmer learns why his son is being accused of murder.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack breaks Penticoff out of prison, hoping to find out what happened to Kim, and Palmer learns why his son is being accused of murder.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 5:00 A.M. - 6:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Alarm bells ring when Gaines contacts Jack, and Palmer considers his political future. Plus, the dead body in the car boot is identified.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Alarm bells ring when Gaines contacts Jack, and Palmer considers his political future. Plus, the dead body in the car boot is identified.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Alarm bells ring when Gaines contacts Jack, and Palmer considers his political future. Plus, the dead body in the car boot is identified.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 6:00 A.M. - 7:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Gaines forces Jack to kidnap Nina, Rick and Kim try to escape from the compound. Palmer prepares to go public with Keith's story, too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Gaines forces Jack to kidnap Nina, Rick and Kim try to escape from the compound. Palmer prepares to go public with Keith's story, too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Gaines forces Jack to kidnap Nina, Rick and Kim try to escape from the compound. Palmer prepares to go public with Keith's story, too.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 7:00 A.M. - 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The assassin gets to ready to fire, and Gaines positions Jack to take the fall for a crime. Nina and Tony find their in-house spy as well.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The assassin gets to ready to fire, and Gaines positions Jack to take the fall for a crime. Nina and Tony find their in-house spy as well.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The assassin gets to ready to fire, and Gaines positions Jack to take the fall for a crime. Nina and Tony find their in-house spy as well.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack escapes from custody, and Nina and Tony try to get Jamey to confess everything she knows. Elsewhere, Teri sacrifices her honour to save Kim.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack escapes from custody, and Nina and Tony try to get Jamey to confess everything she knows. Elsewhere, Teri sacrifices her honour to save Kim.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack escapes from custody, and Nina and Tony try to get Jamey to confess everything she knows. Elsewhere, Teri sacrifices her honour to save Kim.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 9:00 A.M. - 10:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Nina tries to help Jack locate Teri by tracing a phone call, and CTU's new boss takes over. Meanwhile, Palmer learns about Carl's plans.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nina tries to help Jack locate Teri by tracing a phone call, and CTU's new boss takes over. Meanwhile, Palmer learns about Carl's plans.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nina tries to help Jack locate Teri by tracing a phone call, and CTU's new boss takes over. Meanwhile, Palmer learns about Carl's plans.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jack kidnaps a businessman who may have vital information, tensions mount when Drazen pushes Gaines to kill Teri and Kim.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jack kidnaps a businessman who may have vital information, tensions mount when Drazen pushes Gaines to kill Teri and Kim.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jack kidnaps a businessman who may have vital information, tensions mount when Drazen pushes Gaines to kill Teri and Kim.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 11:00 A.M. - 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack is reunited with Teri and Kim at the compound, but the nightmare isn't over just yet. Plus, Palmer tries to protect Keith's therapist.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack is reunited with Teri and Kim at the compound, but the nightmare isn't over just yet. Plus, Palmer tries to protect Keith's therapist.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack is reunited with Teri and Kim at the compound, but the nightmare isn't over just yet. Plus, Palmer tries to protect Keith's therapist.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Things seem to be on the up when Jack and his family manage to escape from the compound. Palmer, however, has a dilemma on his hands.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Things seem to be on the up when Jack and his family manage to escape from the compound. Palmer, however, has a dilemma on his hands.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Things seem to be on the up when Jack and his family manage to escape from the compound. Palmer, however, has a dilemma on his hands.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Trouble brews for Teri and Kim once again when an assassin follows them to the hospital. Jack, meanwhile, is busy being interrogated at CTU.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Trouble brews for Teri and Kim once again when an assassin follows them to the hospital. Jack, meanwhile, is busy being interrogated at CTU.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Trouble brews for Teri and Kim once again when an assassin follows them to the hospital. Jack, meanwhile, is busy being interrogated at CTU.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 2:00 P.M. - 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Palmer and Jack figure out why they've been targeted, and Teri and Kim head to the safe house. Assassin Alexis reveals his connections, too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Palmer and Jack figure out why they've been targeted, and Teri and Kim head to the safe house. Assassin Alexis reveals his connections, too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Palmer and Jack figure out why they've been targeted, and Teri and Kim head to the safe house. Assassin Alexis reveals his connections, too.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 3:00 P.M. -  4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Drazen's men manage to track down Teri and Kim at the safe house, and Jack and Palmer uncover Elizabeth's affair with Alexis.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Drazen's men manage to track down Teri and Kim at the safe house, and Jack and Palmer uncover Elizabeth's affair with Alexis.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Drazen's men manage to track down Teri and Kim at the safe house, and Jack and Palmer uncover Elizabeth's affair with Alexis.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 4:00 P.M. - 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack uses Elizabeth as bait to trap Alexis, and Kim reaches out to Rick for help. Meanwhile, Keith begs his dad to go public with Carl's dirty tricks.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack uses Elizabeth as bait to trap Alexis, and Kim reaches out to Rick for help. Meanwhile, Keith begs his dad to go public with Carl's dirty tricks.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack uses Elizabeth as bait to trap Alexis, and Kim reaches out to Rick for help. Meanwhile, Keith begs his dad to go public with Carl's dirty tricks.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 5:00 P.M. - 6:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jack pretends to be Alexis in an important meeting, Parslow tends to Teri. Kim, on the other hand, finds herself in the middle of a drug deal.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jack pretends to be Alexis in an important meeting, Parslow tends to Teri. Kim, on the other hand, finds herself in the middle of a drug deal.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jack pretends to be Alexis in an important meeting, Parslow tends to Teri. Kim, on the other hand, finds herself in the middle of a drug deal.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 6:00 P.M. - 7:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Mason drive to Saugus to chase up their lead, while Parslow takes a disorientated Teri home. Plus, Palmer confesses all in a press conference.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and Mason drive to Saugus to chase up their lead, while Parslow takes a disorientated Teri home. Palmer confesses all in a press conference.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack and Mason drive to Saugus to chase up their lead, while Parslow takes a disorientated Teri home. Plus, Palmer confesses all in a press conference.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 7:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Palmer and Sherry's relationship is strained by his recent confessions, and Jack stumbles upon a hidden government prison holding a secret prisoner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Palmer and Sherry's relationship is strained by his recent confessions, and Jack stumbles upon a hidden government prison holding a secret prisoner.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Palmer and Sherry's relationship is strained by his recent confessions, and Jack stumbles upon a hidden government prison holding a secret prisoner.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 8:00 P.M. - 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The stakes are raised when Victor takes Jack hostage. Palmer, meanwhile, flirts with his speech writer, and Kim makes progress with the police.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The stakes are raised when Victor takes Jack hostage. Palmer, meanwhile, flirts with his speech writer, and Kim makes progress with the police.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The stakes are raised when Victor takes Jack hostage. Palmer, meanwhile, flirts with his speech writer, and Kim makes progress with the police.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 9:00 P.M. - 10:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Mason finally agrees to make the swap, trading Alexis for Jack. Elsewhere, the chemistry between Palmer and Patty is proving problematic.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mason finally agrees to make the swap, trading Alexis for Jack. Elsewhere, the chemistry between Palmer and Patty is proving problematic.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mason finally agrees to make the swap, trading Alexis for Jack. Elsewhere, the chemistry between Palmer and Patty is proving problematic.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 10:00 P.M. - 11:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack makes a smart move after protecting Palmer from another murder attempt, while Nina and Tony worry a mole is in their midst at CTU.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack makes a smart move after protecting Palmer from another murder attempt, while Nina and Tony worry a mole is in their midst at CTU.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack makes a smart move after protecting Palmer from another murder attempt, while Nina and Tony worry a mole is in their midst at CTU.

includedAssets.title: Day 1: 11:00 P.M. - 12:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Emotions run high in the shock-filled first season finale. While Jack leads an attack on the Drazens, Palmer deals with Sherry's many betrayals.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Emotions run high in the shock-filled first season finale. While Jack leads an attack on the Drazens, Palmer deals with Sherry's many betrayals.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Kiefer Sutherland stars as all-action counter terrorist agent Jack Bauer, who faces a race to save the world as we know it in this groundbreaking real-time thriller. The Los Angeles CTU is called into action when they learn of an assassination plot against a prominent senator, but things soon get personal for Jack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Kiefer Sutherland stars as counter terrorist agent Jack Bauer in this groundbreaking real-time thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Kiefer Sutherland stars as all-action counter terrorist agent Jack Bauer, who faces a race to save the world as we know it in this groundbreaking real-time thriller. The Los Angeles CTU is called into action when they learn of an assassination plot against a prominent senator, but things soon get personal for Jack.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
